body:
Dark and solid, this worn staff appears to be carved of rough stone, yet feels and weighs like light wood. It allows use of the following spells:

  • Arcane lock (1 charge)
  • Grease (1 charge)
  • Wind wall (1 charge)
  • Wall of fire (2 charges)
  • Wall of ice (2 charges)
  • Wall of stone (3 charges)
name: Staff of Obstacles
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Rings/Rods and Staves/Staves/Staff of Obstacles
